name: Presto twrp theme
tagline: Theme for my Presto TWRP build 2.5
body:
### TWRP dark Holo theme
This is the theme I modified to use with TWRP on the Pantech Burst. It comes included with my builds. If you would like to download the source then see the directions below.

```
TWRP 2.5
git clone https://github.com/marduk191/Presto_TWRP_Theme.git
```

### Authors and Contributors
Original author:
-Coby

modified by:
-RisingFog
-privatekey
-dermann
-marduk191
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
